delete.title: Delete user
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

tour.confirmExit: Are you sure you want to exit the tutorial? You can restart it later.

welcome.title: Welcome to User Management!
welcome.description: This application allows you to manage users easily. Follow this tutorial to learn how to use it.

table.title: Users List
table.description: Here you will see all users in the system. You can sort, search, and perform actions on them.

newUser.title: Create New User
newUser.description: Click this button to open the user creation form. You can add randomized or custom data.

theme.title: Change Theme
theme.description: Switch between light and dark themes according to your preferences.

language.title: Change Language
language.description: You can change the application language between Spanish and English.
